page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar animation object
page.description: Definition of a redraw animation in the control bar.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of animation to do. There are three basic types. The "slide" type will slide the old control bar HTML out while the new HTML slides in. The "swap" type will slide the old HTML out before sliding the new HTML in from the same edge. The "fade" type will cross fade the new and old HTML. The "slide" and "swap" types are suffixed with either a specific edge "left", "right", "top" or "bottom", or with relative values based off the control bar edge "in", "out", "before" or "after". Values can be "slide-left", "slide-right", "slide-top", "slide-bottom", "slide-in", "slide-out", "slide-before", "slide-after", "swap-left", "swap-right", "swap-top", "swap-bottom", "swap-in", "swap-out", "swap-before", "swap-after" or "fade".

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration in milliseconds that the animation should take.

property.name: tween
property.description: The CSS timing function to use for the animation. The default is "ease-in-out".
